author: Santosh

title: Sitecore XM Cloud
content:
What is Sitecore XM Cloud?
Sitecore XM Cloud is Software-as-Service composable cloud-based offering from Sitecore. 
The licensing differs from traditional Sitecore XM/XP, Sitecore Headless offerings.
author: Jose

title: GraphQL
content:
What is GraphQL and how is it better than REST? 
GraphQL is a powerful query language and on the contrary REST over fetch or under fetch the data and does not have an option to perform complex queries.
author: Santosh Ekbote
